page.title: 07 EDUCATION
page.content:
EDUCATION
IN GOREBRIDGE BOTH PRIMARY SCHOOLS ARE OF CELLULAR CONSTRUCTION WITH GOREBRIDGE HAVING AN OPEN PLAN AREA FOR THE INFANT DEPARTMENT.THE SCHOOLS ARE WELL EQUIPPED AND LAID OUT WITH ASSEMBLY HALLS GYMNASIA LIBRARIES CLASSROOMS AND GENERAL PURPOSE ROOMS. BOTH SCHOOLS HAVE A KITCHEN ON THE PREMISES AND PROVIDE A MIDDAY MEAL FOR A LARGE NUMBER OF CHILDREN-MANY BEING ENTITLED TO CLAIM FREE MEALS.CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL EDUCATIONAL NEEDS ARE HELPED BY THE CHILD GUIDANCE SERVICE WHO GIVE THOSE WITH LEARNING OR BEHAVIOURIAL DIFFICULTIES EXTRA HELP TO DEAL WITH THEIR PROBLEMS.THE HEALTH OF SCHOOL CHILDREN IS MONITORED BY SCHOOL DOCTORS NURSES AND DENTISTS IN LIASON WITH THE AREA HEALTH BOARD.
